title: Page 4 of 43 - Make Informed Decisions
cleaned_text: Researchers have investigated the incidence of heart inflammation after Pfizer and Moderna vaccination in Denmark. They found that both vaccines, and especially Moderna, are linked to an increased rate of inflammation in two areas of the heart. The scientists stress that — as the absolute numbers were small — the …
